AboutPage.title: Hi. I'm Andrian
AboutPage.description: I'm a frontend developer, with experience in building responsive, high-performance web applications. I'm a native Ukrainian speaker with English as my second language
AboutPage.whereImFromDescription: I was born in Tlumach, Ukraine, but grew up in Kolomyia until the age of 2. Afterwards, I moved to Lviv, where I attended primary, secondary, and high school. After graduating, I enrolled at Lviv Polytechnic University, where I am still studying while working as a Frontend developer.

preferencesList.music: Nelly Furtado x Quarterhead - All Good Things

work-1.details: I was involved in developing an internal platform for a Canadian construction company aimed to improve staff operations and user experience.

work-2.employmentDetails: Full-time July 2025 - present, Trainee Frontend Developer
